title: If statements to print based on score - write code

content.question: Which of the following code segments will print the correct message for any valid value of score?

choices.label: String message = ""; if (score < 250) { message = "Try again."; } else if (score <= 500) { message = "Good!"; } else { message = "Great!"; } System.out.println(message);
String message = ""; if (score < 250) { message = "Try again."; } if (score <= 500) { message = "Good!"; } else { message = "Great!"; } System.out.println(message);
String message = ""; if (score >= 250) { message = "Good!"; } else if (score > 500) { message = "Great!"; } else { message = "Try again."; } System.out.println(message);
String message = ""; if (score > 500) { message = "Great!"; } else if (score <= 500) { message = "Good!"; } else { message = "Try again."; } System.out.println(message);

content.answer: String message = ""; if (score < 250) { message = "Try again."; } else if (score <= 500) { message = "Good!"; } else { message = "Great!"; } System.out.println(message);

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
